mapper.select: SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(*) >= 1 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS IDCHECK FROM MEMBER WHERE MEM_ID = #{memId}

choose.when: INSERT INTO MEMBER(MEM_ID, MEM_PW, MEM_NAME, MEM_TEL, GEN_CODE, MEM_COMP, MEM_INTRO, MEM_PIC) VALUES(#{memId}, #{memPw}, #{memName}, #{memTel}, #{memGen}, #{memComp}, #{memIntro}, #{memPic})

INSERT INTO MEMBER(MEM_ID, MEM_PW, MEM_NAME, MEM_TEL, GEN_CODE, MEM_COMP, MEM_INTRO, MEM_PIC, CATE_CODE1) VALUES(#{memId}, #{memPw}, #{memName}, #{memTel}, #{memGen}, #{memComp}, #{memIntro}, #{memPic}, #{memCate1})
choose.otherwise: INSERT INTO MEMBER(MEM_ID, MEM_PW, MEM_NAME, MEM_TEL, GEN_CODE, MEM_COMP, MEM_INTRO, MEM_PIC, CATE_CODE1, CATE_CODE2) VALUES(#{memId}, #{memPw}, #{memName}, #{memTel}, #{memGen}, #{memComp}, #{memIntro}, #{memPic}, #{memCate1}, #{memCate2})

choose.when: UPDATE MEMBER SET MEM_NAME=#{memName}, MEM_TEL=#{memTel}, GEN_CODE=#{memGen}, MEM_COMP=#{memComp}, MEM_INTRO=#{memIntro}, CATE_CODE1=#{memCate1}, CATE_CODE2=null WHERE MEM_ID=#{memId}
choose.otherwise: UPDATE MEMBER SET MEM_NAME=#{memName}, MEM_TEL=#{memTel}, GEN_CODE=#{memGen}, MEM_COMP=#{memComp}, MEM_INTRO=#{memIntro}, CATE_CODE1=#{memCate1}, CATE_CODE2=#{memCate2} WHERE MEM_ID=#{memId}
